website_summaries.verdict: This glass ashtray might be basic, but it has a heavy feel and a quality build.
pros: A sturdy and highly functional ashtray that looks great and is easy to clean
We like the size, which is larger than many competitors
Attractive enough that it can alternatively be used as a decorative dish for serving sweets or nuts
cons: Certain cigarettes may slide into the tray as side grooves are steeply angled

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and look`
customer_reviews.text: My mother wanted something that was a nostalgic reminder of what her parents and grandparents used when she was younger. I ordered this for her birthday and she said it was amazingly similar to so many of the ash trays and crystal dishes that used to be used. She is very happy with it and it looks amazing on the side table.
customer_reviews.author: Wil

customer_reviews.title: Old  School ..... Timeless in design
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and manly. It causes me to think of Jazz & Speakeasies & Dancing all night. Isn't it funny what this piece can evoke? This review is for the square one... not the round one, which is too deep.
customer_reviews.author: FZ

customer_reviews.title: Good indoor/ outdoor cigar ashtray at a modest price
customer_reviews.text: Good indoor/ outdoor cigar ashtray at a modest price. Could only be better by having larger slots to hold large- gauge cigars.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Impressive - Heavy quality lead crystal. Not sure they are ashtrays though
customer_reviews.text: Heavy pieces. No grooves cut for cigarettes, which is great as I don't smoke. They seem more like candy trays if that makes any sense
customer_reviews.author: C.S

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a mixed media art project. Very heavy-duty, extremely happy with the quality of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: fleet56

customer_reviews.title: looks nice, Ours was filled and when i put one ...
customer_reviews.text: looks nice, Ours was filled and when i put one out it was not out all the way and had a small fire. when i went to empty it the bottom broke out.
customer_reviews.author: Random user

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special, just plain ashtray. I ordered to go in cast iron ashtray. Diameter perfect but too thick to fit. Not worth sending back. Will give it for a house warming or gift to someone that I know that smokes.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon PhillipsKindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds plenty of stuff
customer_reviews.text: use it to hold my pocket junk and it holds tons, it can even be used as an ashtray too.
customer_reviews.author: Ghod

customer_reviews.title: Product is not only very pretty, but made very well
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and was packaged very securely to prevent breakage in transit. Product is not only very pretty, but made very well. Detailing is very nice and looks perfect on my coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Berglund

customer_reviews.title: Its heavier than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Came in good condition. They packed it well. Its very pretty and heavy, which I love. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Turley

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality glass ashtray!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, who would have thought a person could get so excited by an ashtray! You could mistake this ashtray for one of those heavy crystal candy dishes. It's heavy and high quality, and because it's glass, it's fairly easy to wash off that nasty cigarette residue. It doesn't look tacky either. Throw away your cheap plastic ashtrays and buy a couple of these!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: This ashtray is large and heavy and has no place ...
customer_reviews.text: This ashtray is large and heavy and has no place to set your cigarettes it will just fall into the bottom of the ashes it's very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Candy dish! No dip in rim to hold cigarettes or cigars!
customer_reviews.text: Candy dish! No dip in rim to hold cigarettes or cigars! Looking for an ashtray? This is not it!
customer_reviews.author: Intell45

customer_reviews.title: Good looking ash tray.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. I use it for my cigars. Plenty big.
customer_reviews.author: William Allen

customer_reviews.title: Occasional ashtray use
customer_reviews.text: When we’re not using it as an ashtray we use it as a bowl for keys, change, etc.
customer_reviews.author: AY

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Good Quality Ashtray
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Great option if you want a med to large substantial ashtray. It is decorative without being gaudy. I'm very happy with purchasing 2 of these & I feel as though I def received good quality and value for just a little bit more than a very basic plastic ashtray.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It functions as advertised and looks great while doing it
customer_reviews.text: Use it for a cigar ashtray and have received several compliments. It functions as advertised and looks great while doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these SICOHOME Glass Ashtray Round Diameter 5.9", because they are useful and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: not an ashtray
customer_reviews.text: If I wanted a small candy dish, than this would be perfect, but I wanted an ashtray. The dish is too deep for an ashtray, and the slits on top do not go all the way thru, but only there for decoration on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very handsome ashtray. I do not ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handsome ashtray. I do not smoke but have guests coming from England that do, so I wanted to have an ashtray for them. I am very pleasantly surprised at the weight. My only regret is that I didn't order two!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Not actually an ashtray
customer_reviews.text: My primary criteria for an ashtray is that you can put a cigarette on the edge and it stays there. This item fails that test.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Zamarro

customer_reviews.title: DMVMT
customer_reviews.text: I needed a glass ashtray to put on my desk, but I didn't want one that was too big, or too cheap looking. This ashtray fit my requirements. It's elegant, as ashtrays go, and it's not too heavy. The etched pattern is quite unique. It could also be used as a candy or not bowl because it doesn't look like an ashtray.
customer_reviews.author: DMVMT

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't hold a cigarette very well. You put ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold a cigarette very well. You put your cigarette down on it, and it will roll off. It rolled off while my friend was using it and it burnt a whole in my table.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Stroud

customer_reviews.title: But it is a nice ashtray.
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy cut glass ashtray, but it was suggested to fit in the stand ashtray that I bought. It does not fit, too big. But it is a nice ashtray.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and decorative! Definitely high quality for a good price. I use it as a candy dish, but also know that my husband will steal it if he ever needs an ash tray for cigars in his poker room. Love this multifunctional and elegant piece.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria B

customer_reviews.title: Decorative ash tray
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected. This is a very nice, sturdy, and beautiful ash tray. It cleans nicely and easily, and looks nice on my coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: This ashtray is very nice and heavy. The only issue is that the slots to hold a cigarette or cigar are small and hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: WWF

customer_reviews.title: Very Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Product is junk. If I could give it less than one star I would. I would return the item but due to the vendor charge for returns it isn't worth the hassle. Very disappointed and will avoid this vendor in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Ashtray
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the squared one and I like it very much, beautiful glass very detailed.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Not functional.
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy that a cigarette cannot rest on the edge, and will slide down into the bottom. I am returning these because of that. They are beautiful but not functional.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It was much bigger than I thought it would be, about as big as my entire hand, made out of glass and has some weight to it. Very happy with this it's perfect for cigars.

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This piece is so pretty! It looks really expensive, I was very impressed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and Looks classy! It can be used as any other home decor item and not just an Ashtray.

customer_reviews.title: Glass helps my husband from burning our tabletops like he has done before when he used cheap ash ...
customer_reviews.text: HUGE size ash tray. Glass helps my husband from burning our tabletops like he has done before when he used cheap ash trays. Itcan hold a couple of packs of cigarette ashes before it needs to be dumped out.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very nice ashtray, although it doesn't have a indent to hold cigars
customer_reviews.text: A very pleasant looking ashtray - just like the photo. A very good value.

customer_reviews.title: We get a lot of compliments on these
customer_reviews.text: Love how thick this is. Easy to clean. We have multiple. We use one for a candle holder. Love this.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Ward

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but....
customer_reviews.text: This is more of a candy dish than an ashtray as the the curves on the side don't properly hold a cigarette. It's nice looking though, so I guess you can use it for both.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dorn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent high quality ashtray. It turned out to be much better than expected

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: easy to clean easy to use as a ash tray or candy bowl

customer_reviews.title: Not an ash tray for a cigarette
customer_reviews.text: As others have pointed out, although it does look good, it isn't really an ash tray for a cigarette. The notches aren't deep enough to hang on to a cig and point downward so that the cig falls down.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! It’s pretty big to be an ashtray but definitely a beauty. Great quality.

customer_reviews.title: exactly what you would expect
customer_reviews.text: look good as a showpiece if you are not a smoker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a very low price

customer_reviews.title: TOP QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: Top quality ashtrays. They look beautiful on my tables. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: nice thick glass
customer_reviews.text: nice thick glass, but there are no grooves to place lit cigarettes or cigars, so it would be better with that functionality

customer_reviews.title: it is an ashtray....
customer_reviews.text: what can I say. it is a large heavy duty ashtray.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful catch all bowl!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: This is not a good ashtray for cigarette smokers
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good ashtray for cigarette smokers. Maybe if you smoke cigars this might be good for you however it sucks for cigarettes. I actually used mine as a candy dish and that looks way better. It’s heavy it’s great quality it’s beautiful but it’s not an ashtray for cigarettes unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: Paola Vianna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it was broken when I received it item was in a hundred pieces
customer_reviews.author: terry bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: More useful as a candy dish than an ashtray.
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautiful. It is very heavy and looks to be well made. It reminds me of the ashtrays I saw when I was growing up, except for one thing..... The indentation where you lay your cigarettes on are very shallow and hard to see. There are four, once you find them and place the first one at 12 o'clock, then the others are at 3, 6, and 9 o'clock. Unfortunately, they are not easy to lay your cigarette on it if you need to leave quickly or even leisurely. I would use this more for a candy dish than an ashtray
customer_reviews.author: Jule

customer_reviews.title: Dysfunctional Ash Tray
customer_reviews.text: I would probably love this ashtray if it had indentations on the top to prevent your cigarette from falling into the vase. It’s rather annoying having to fish your cigarette out of the ashes if you need to put it down. It’s a heavy piece and it’s nice looking but it lacks in function.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly G

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: No slots to hold a cigarette in place, but really pretty, really heavy, looks like the nice ashtrays my parents used to have. I mean for its purpose it's very pretty. Could be used to hold jewelry or candy since it doesn’t have the actual cigarette slots on the edges, makes it versatile.
customer_reviews.author: BuilderGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great ashtray and any one who says it wasnt made ...
customer_reviews.text: Great ashtray and any one who says it wasnt made to hold cigs has never used a legit ashtray or isnt to bright either...
customer_reviews.author: Casey Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant for the price
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this glass piece. It is extremely elegant and worth the money. I was surprised when I unpacked it since it looks very expensive. I definitely recommend it to anyone who is looking for a fine glass ashtray. I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: EBB

customer_reviews.title: Great ashtray! Decent looking in the photo but much ...
customer_reviews.text: Great ashtray! Decent looking in the photo but much better in person. Large size makes it convenient as it is mainly used for my stogie sessions. Also, it came with a nice cloth pad which you can place on the underside to help protect your tabletop.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I love this sparkling ashtray
customer_reviews.text: I love this sparkling ashtray, out shines those dingy plastic ones. The light catches it and its sparkle is a joy.
customer_reviews.author: James Harrington

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap and sturdy, I'm thinking about getting a second one to ...
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap and sturdy, I'm thinking about getting a second one to use for candy and stuff like that. It's also the perfect size, most of these ashtrays are way too small for what I use them for.
customer_reviews.author: Jane K

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY, AND VERY VERSATILE.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 25 year old grandson. He had wanted a nice looking ash tray that he could carry with him when he goes outside to smoke. He was quite pleased. It is very heavy, and a very attractive piece, no matter how you choose to use it. I am not a smoker, but this same item would make a beautiful serving piece or candy dish.
customer_reviews.author: MAMA2ROMEO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very classy ashtray and exactly like the photo arrived really fast! I love it and will order another
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: This ashtray is very nice looking, but there is no place to rest ...
customer_reviews.text: This ashtray is very nice looking, but there is no place to rest the cigarette around the edges, which kind of defeats the purpose. All of my other ashtrays have several places around the rim where one can set a lighted cigarette.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Erb

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: A great bargain. It’s already proven it’s durability . Accidentally it was knocked to the deck and no problem whatsoever.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality. Heavy weight makes it feel more expensive then it is.

customer_reviews.title: Not for cigarettes
customer_reviews.text: This ash tray may be more suited for cigars. A cigarette just slips down . I bought 2 and threw them both away after half a cigarette.

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Lovely style, just like the picture, However, it is much larger than I imagined. Be sure to check dimensions. High score because the return process was a breeze.
